H0.text: what kind of money do i bring to mexico. US Dollar

H1.text: what kind of money do i bring to mexico. Euro

H2.text: what kind of money do i bring to mexico. Canadian Dollar

H3.text: what kind of money do i bring to mexico. Mexican peso

A4.text: The Mexican peso (symbol: $; currency code: MXN; also abbreviated Mex$ to distinguish it from other peso-denominated currencies; referred to as the peso, Mexican peso, or colloquially varo) is the official currency of Mexico.
